title: How Israel Repurposed Its Gaza Playbook to Justify Mass Slaughter in Lebanon | Economy | Before It's News
text: How Israel Repurposed Its Gaza Playbook to Justify Mass Slaughter in Lebanon from 21st Century Wire: In the deadliest assault since 2006, Israeli airstrikes across southern and eastern Lebanon have killed 558 people, including 50 children, and wounded over 1,835, according to the Lebanese Health Ministry.
